name: 布莱恩·斯寇拉洛
name_full: 布莱恩·斯寇拉洛 Brian Scolaro
introduction: Brian Scolaro is an actor, writer, comedian, voice actor, and producer. He has been on Mad Men, Grey's Anatomy, Shameless, Alto Knights, Godfather of Harlem, Night Court, Abbott Elementary, Dexter, Bones, Castle, Screamboat, The Middle, etc. He was Stuart on Stacked, Gordon on Three Sisters, Brian on A Million Little Things, Doug on Sullivan and Son, Uncle Bill on Ten Year Old Tom, and Goblin on Wizards of Waverly Place. He has done stand-up comedy on Conan, Comedy Central Presents, Gotham Comedy Live, Dry Bar Comedy, The Late Late Show, Late Nite, and an Amazon Prime/Apple TV Special.
